data.eml:eml: A new species of Polyplectropus Ulmer 1905 (Trichoptera: Polycentropodidae) from Minas Gerais State, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rocha, Isabela Cristina, Dumas, Leandro Lourenço, Nessimian, Jorge Luiz (2016): A new species of Polyplectropus Ulmer 1905 (Trichoptera: Polycentropodidae) from Minas Gerais State, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4072 (3): 391-395, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.3.9
